title: Chilled serious players for a rank team GIRLS encouraged to join GET YOURSELF NOTICED!
body:
So been searching for a team to join without much luck. So creating my own. It will mostly be a get to know team first before we start playing ranked. Goal? try to get high as possible while helping team learn more. Reason why encourage girls to join is because the missus doesn't believe girls would take this game seriously HOWEVER don't have to just a personal thing haha. ANYWHO like I said this team is to be a get to know first so whether you like my company or not no hard feelings. So below is a rough scaffold of what i need you to answer before anything. So lets get started.

IGN:
Age:
Gender:
Rank:
Role:
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others*
Why League is fun for you:
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :)
THAT IS ALL :D

replies.body:
**IGN:** Yaiamone 
**Age:** 19
**Gender:** F
**Rank:** Bronze I 
**Role:** Support :D 
**Preferred social media:** Skype (others make my computer lag)
**Why League is fun for you:** I find it really relaxing and I love being competitive with all of the friends that play league.
**Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :)** I like joining teams and meeting new people. I like playing ranked 5s and learning from people, especially those in higher elos than me (usually play ranked 5s with gold+). 

***Note: **I probably won't be able to play much until mid january due to having limited internet connection where I currently am. *
waiting for you to come online so i can chat to ya so far got 3 girls in the team so youll be forth! hoorah let me know when youll be on :D ill give you a debreifing
I'll be on tomorrow (probably all day).
havent seen you on :c all day :c

IGN: Darth R2
Age:19
Gender: M
Rank: B2
Role: adc/sup
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others*   Skype 
Why League is fun for you: ill like the competitiveness of the game 
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :)  i personally have no friends that are gamers so ive always played lol by myself, would like to actually be able to go online and say hey to other people and play a game with them. Also would just love to learn more from others so i can get out of bronze hell.
hey hey mate no problem always glad to welcome new players in ill most likely put you in team B once i get it started. if still keen youll enjoy mah company rock on!

IGN: BM Angie
Age: 15
Gender: F
Rank: Silver 5 (s4)
Role: Any role :) - but I make mistakes with jungling :P
Preferred social media: skype and facebook
Why League is fun for you: I just naturally love video games. Especially league. I love analyzing and using mind tricks in games. Also, when games required 100% of your mind and your reflexes.
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) - I want to meet new members (especially girls) and have fun with them. I use my mistakes, plays, knowledge and ranked experienced to hone my skills.

**IGN:** DiddlyDonger
**Age:** 17
**Gender:** Female
**Rank:** Silver 3
**Role:** Sup/ADC mainly > Mid > Jungle > top
**Preferred social media:** skype, teamspeak, curse
**Why League is fun for you: **It's just so addictive and I love playing with friends/meeting new people
**Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :)** I'm looking for a ranked team to help me climb the ladder whilst making some friends along the way. And its also good to see that there will be some girls in the team :)

IGN: Officer Caitlyn
Age: 16
Gender: Female
Rank: plat 2
Role: Support/Adc
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* : *I has skype*
Why League is fun for you: Much social
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) : Interested in meeting new friends (:
added everyone hopefully you guys will be on for a chat! :D

ouch
didnt get one.....
oh :(
hhaha
i added you when i said everyone i mean i added everyone lol

IGN: Moeyondabulk
Age:17
Gender:M
Rank: B2
Role: I can fill any positions pretty decently, I enjoy mid most tho :).  
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* Skype =)
Why League is fun for you: I find it an awesome opportunity to make new friends, and also challenge myself with all the strategic ways to win.! 
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) Been looking for a team :) {{champion:106}}

IGN: Thatzwhatshezed
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Rank: Gold
Role: Top/Mid or ADC
Skype preferred but can easily download others if needed.

I got into League at the end of last year because my friends convinced me to play we used to all get together and play and since then I have thoroughly enjoyed this game. I made it to gold 1 this season but dropped due to being busy and I am now looking to get back into it.

I would like to join because I want something more serious/fun. My friends are more casual and not looking to play seriously as a ranked 5s team.
coool cool thanks for the app with you most likely filling up the secondlast place of team B hopefully we can get it going soon xD if still keen welcome to the team :D
Awesome looks like I got in just in time then ;) Yeah defs just let me know when we will get together and play.

IGN: Reddragonau 
Age: 21
Gender: M
Rank: Gold 3
Role: Adc/ Sup but i will play anything cause it give a chance lane
Preferred social media: skype, ts and curse
Why League is fun for you: cause a the game is so in depth that there is so much to learn  
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team. i want to make some more league friends. i  want to help people to get better at the game and learn from others. and it would be fun to meet new people
hey hey mate will likely be putting you in team B because of a few applicants xD will keep you posted if still keen on joining your royal awesomeness being me haha will keep you posted :D
no problem mate i will add  you in game and u can keep up up to date

IGN: Smoogle
Age: 22
Gender: M
Rank: G4
Role: Jungle
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* Any
Why League is fun for you: I like the strategy and teamwork involved and climbing ranks and seeing improvment
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? : Meet new people and have fun :D

heya bud will probably be getting you into team B xD reasons being because everyone loves my company and lots of apps haha will get back to you soon if still keen on joining AWESOME haha will chat to ya soon

IGN: Istezz
Age: 17
Gender: M
Rank: Silver 1 last season (still need to do promo games)
Role: Jungle, Adc or Support
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* Skype
Why League is fun for you: It's a game I can play with friends, relaz a little and meeting new people
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) I'm bored and want to meet new people. I also want to improve my current lol skills and possibly get new skills
hey hey buddy good to see youre willing to learn! most likel put you in the second team if youre still keen on joining awesome! will hit you up soon mate :D

IGN: Cymru
Age: 20
Gender: Male
Rank: Silver V
Role: ADC Pref or Support
Preferred social media: Skype pref, also have TS, curse voice and Vent
Why League is fun for you: League is a great for making friends and kicking but as a team :)
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team?: I enjoy meeting new people helping others and learning myself and being apart of this i feel i could fill those aspects.

hey buddy currently team is full however going to be starting a team B ill most likely put you in this team if youre still keen on joining my royal awesomeness ill get back to you :D thanks for the app!
Hey man I'm keen on a B team or whatever add me an keep me informed :)

Doing great for applications 4 gals have signed up for the dream of hitting it high and 4 other dudes have join opening up a team B for those who are still keen to join yours truly in an epic adventure LOL screw that corniness anywho! any of you still keen keep applying will debrief each and every one of you personally :)

cool cool I'll most likely put you in the second team if youre still keen on joining us so far got a full team and eveeryones cool to stay so will start a 2nd team ill get back to you soon if youre still keen mate :)
awesome awesome got lots of apps thinking of making a Team B if people are genuinely keen to enjoy my company! :D

IGN: Queen Of Hearts ❤
Age: 19
Gender: Female
Rank: Gold lV
Role: Adc, Sup, Mid
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* Curse Voice ❤
Why League is fun for you: Mainly fun for me because my brothers play they're the ones who got me into this game and definitely certain people i have met while playing League ❤ 
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) Well like you said, Been searching for a team to join without much luck :P
THAT IS ALL :D

Alright added you guys just waiting on accept and we can get started and as for Yaiamone thats fine cause like title says chilled serious so its no big deal glad to have you guys on board. Anyone else who wants to apply still can :)

IGN: Candyblock
Age: 18
Gender: F
Rank: S3
Role: ADC
Preferred social media: Skype for sure. 
Why League is fun for you: It's totally different to any game I've ever played before. It's mentally stimulating and provides me with a goal and something to aim for. I feel like I'm playing League for a reason, rather than just to log on and f**k around (which is basically what I did on every other game). 
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) I want to know what it's like to play as a team where everyone is familiar with each other and their roles. It'll make communication so much easier and maybe even make the game even more enjoyable for me. Sometimes it's better to play with a group of friends rather than on your own in solo queue. I'd also love to learn more about the game.

IGN: Ezreal God
Age: 18
Gender: M
Rank: Diamond 5
Role: Jungle
Preferred social media: Skype
Why League is fun for you: Well it's a competitive game and I like winning.
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? Dunno really guess I could teach some stuff.

IGN: You need Jesus
Age: 18 
Gender: Male
Rank: i am Silver 3 
Role: Top lane is my preference followed by Support.
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* I use skype mainly but i like using both teamspeak and curse voice because of certain benifits of them
Why League is fun for you: League is fun for me because i get to play with my mates alot, and also that i learn alot about this game. there is more reasons but i wouldn't wanna' bore you 
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :)  I've been trying to create a Team for a while now but i just never was able to get it going. so i'm now looking for a ranked team where i can fit in and Learn more about the game.

IGN: Mullyplant94
Age:20
Gender: m
Rank: Bronze iV ( im not braindead tho )
Role: Anywhere i need to be
Preferred social media: skype, ts, others* Skype pref
Why League is fun for you: HA, i ask myself this question all the time, iunno koz its something new
Reason for wanting to join 'yours truly' team? :) Looking for a team, put in a bunch of apps like hour or so, first in and il join, ( kinda want to be loyal )
THAT IS ALL :D

> Why League is fun for you: HA, i ask myself this question all the time, iunno koz its something new

Well there were the Aeon of Strife, the original Dota and HoN. And prob a few lesser known ones.

But yes, MOBA/ARTS is still a genre in its growing stage.
Yeah, i should of said new for me, im used to FPS tbh , made the change to MOBA like 8 months ago or so, been fun, just sick of having to carry teams in bronze ( i struggle to carry )

Well there are still girls in high elo.

I at least know that there is a diamond girl streamer. Just know about her yesterday though but I don't believe there is no girl who takes League seriously, the proportion is prob the same just the total number being smaller I would guess.

Anyways, don't pay too much mind on the stereotypings because they're either completely false or just a very narrowed insight on a small portion of the entire picture.
haha yeah agreed :)
